member.summary: Combines all the elements of an array into a string.
member.param: The string to put in between each element of the array
member.returns: The elements of the array combined into a string

member.name: M:ATEM.ATEMMethods.SubArray``1(``0[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a subarray from this instance. This subarray starts at a specified element position and has a specified length
member.param: The zero-based starting element position of a subarray in this instance
The number of elements in the subarray
member.returns: An array that is equivalent to the subarray of length length that begins at startIndex in this instance.
member.exception: startIndex plus length indicates a position not within this instance. -or- startIndex or length is less than zero.

member.name: M:ATEM.ATEMMethods.SubArray``1(``0[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a subarray from this instance. This subarray starts at a specified element position and continues to the end of the array
member.param: The zero-based starting element position of a subarray in this instance
member.returns: An array that is equivalent to the subarray that begins at startIndex in this instance, or new object[] { } if startIndex is equal to the length of this instance
member.exception: startIndex plus length indicates a position not within this instance. -or- startIndex is less than zero.

member.returns: An list that is equivalent to the sublist of length length that begins at startIndex in this instance.
member.exception: startIndex plus length indicates a position not within this instance. -or- startIndex or length is less than zero.

member.name: M:ATEM.ATEMMethods.GetFromLast``1(``0[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns an element from an array, counting from the end of the array rather than the start Imagine T[i] if T[i] called the last element of the array
member.param: The position in the array you want to get from, counting from the last element in the array. The last element is 0.
member.returns: The requested item in the array

member.name: M:ATEM.ATEMMethods.SetFromLast``1(``0[],System.Int32,``0)
member.summary: Sets an element to an array, counting from the end of the array rather than the start Imagine T[i] = val if T[i] called the last element of the array
member.param: The position in the array you want to get from, counting from the last element in the array. The last element is 0.
The value to set the index position to.

member.name: M:ATEM.ATEMMethods.Split(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Returns a string array that contains the substrings in this instance that are delimited by elements of a specified Unicode character array.
member.param: An array of Unicode strings that delimit the substrings in this instance, an empty array that contains no delimiters, or null.
member.returns: An array whose elements contain the substrings in this instance that are delimited by one or more strings in separator. For more information, see the Remarks section.

member.name: M:ATEM.ATEMMethods.Split(System.String,System.String[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a string array that contains the substrings in this string that are delimited by elements of a specified string array. Parameters specify the maximum number of substrings to return and whether to return empty array elements.
member.param: A string array that delimits the substrings in this string, an empty array that contains no delimiters, or null.
The maximum number of substrings to return.
member.returns: An array whose elements contain the substrings in this string that are delimited by one or more strings in separator. For more information, see the Remarks section.
member.exception: options is not one of the System.StringSplitOptions values.

member.name: M:ATEM.ATEMMethods.Invert(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: returns the number of equal and opposite distance of this from axis
member.param: The number to invert around

member.name: T:ATEM.ATEMMethods.FolderExistsResponse
member.summary: Specifies what applicable Overload:ATEMMethods.CopyDirectory overloads should do in the event of destFolderName already existing

member.name: F:ATEM.ATEMMethods.FolderExistsResponse.Reject
member.summary: An instance of the IOException class is thrown

member.name: F:ATEM.ATEMMethods.FolderExistsResponse.MergeKeep
member.summary: The two directories' contents will be merged into destFolderName. If both directories have a file of the same name, the one in sourceFolderName will be discarded.

member.name: F:ATEM.ATEMMethods.FolderExistsResponse.MergeOverwrite
member.summary: The two directories' contents will be merged into destFolderName. If both directories have a file of the same name, the one in sourceFolderName will overwrite the one already in destFolderName.

member.name: M:ATEM.ATEMMethods.CopyDirectory(System.String,System.String,ATEM.ATEMMethods.FolderExistsResponse,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Copies an existing directory and its contents to a new directory. All exceptions this can throw are exceptions thrown by System.IO.File.Copy and System.IO.Directory.CreateDirectory
member.param: The directory to copy
The name of the destination directory. This cannot be an existing directory.
The method by which destFolderName already existing is handled
If true, sourceFolderName's subdirectories and their subdirectories are also copied.

member.name: M:ATEM.ATEMMethods.CopyDirectory(System.String,System.String,ATEM.ATEMMethods.FolderExistsResponse)
member.summary: Copies an existing directory and its contents to a new directory. All exceptions this can throw are exceptions thrown by System.IO.File.Copy and System.IO.Directory.CreateDirectory
member.param: The directory to copy
The name of the destination directory. This cannot be an existing directory.
The method by which destFolderName already existing is handled

member.name: M:ATEM.ATEMMethods.CopyDirectory(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Copies an existing directory and its contents to a new directory. All exceptions this can throw are exceptions thrown by System.IO.File.Copy and System.IO.Directory.CreateDirectory
member.param: The directory to copy
The name of the destination directory. This cannot be an existing directory.

member.name: M:ATEM.ATEMMethods.CopyDirectory(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Copies an existing directory and its contents to a new directory. All exceptions this can throw are exceptions thrown by System.IO.File.Copy and System.IO.Directory.CreateDirectory
member.param: The directory to copy
The name of the destination directory. This cannot be an existing directory.
If true, sourceFolderName's subdirectories and their subdirectories are also copied.
